source:
SELECT DISTINCT L1.name
FROM likes L1
WHERE NOT EXISTS(
SELECT *
FROM likes L2
WHERE L1.name != L2.name
AND NOT EXISTS(
SELECT *
FROM likes L3
WHERE L3.name = L2.name
AND NOT EXISTS(
SELECT *
FROM likes L4
WHERE L4.name = L1.name
AND L4.beer = L3.beer))
AND NOT EXISTS(
SELECT *
FROM likes L5
WHERE L5.name = L1.name
AND NOT EXISTS(
SELECT *
FROM likes L6
WHERE L6.name = L2.name
AND L6.beer= L5.beer)))
author: will
